sn55.6:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū bhagavato cīvarakammaṁ karonti:
sn55.6:1.4: Tena kho pana samayena isidattapurāṇā thapatayo sādhuke paṭivasanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
sn55.6:2.1: Atha kho isidattapurāṇā thapatayo magge purisaṁ ṭhapesuṁ:
sn55.6:2.2: “yadā tvaṁ, ambho purisa, passeyyāsi bhagavantaṁ āgacchantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ, atha amhākaṁ āroceyyāsī”ti.
sn55.6:2.3: Dvīhatīhaṁ ṭhito kho so puriso addasa bhagavantaṁ dūratova āgacchantaṁ.
sn55.6:2.4: Disvāna yena isidattapurāṇā thapatayo tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā isidattapurāṇe thapatayo etadavoca:
sn55.6:2.5: “ayaṁ so, bhante, bhagavā āgacchati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho.
sn55.6:3.1: Atha kho isidattapurāṇā thapatayo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṁsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṁ piṭṭhito piṭṭhito anubandhiṁsu.
sn55.6:3.2: Atha kho bhagavā maggā okkamma yena aññataraṁ rukkhamūlaṁ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
sn55.6:3.3: Isidattapurāṇā thapatayo bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ nisīdiṁsu.
sn55.6:3.4: Ekamantaṁ nisinnā kho te isidattapurāṇā thapatayo bhagavantaṁ etadavocuṁ:
sn55.6:4.2: ‘sāvatthiyā kosalesu cārikaṁ pakkamissatī’ti, hoti no tasmiṁ samaye anattamanatā hoti domanassaṁ:

sn55.6:13.1: Yadā pana mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ suṇāma:
sn55.6:13.2: ‘kosalehi sāvatthiṁ cārikaṁ pakkamissatī’ti, hoti no tasmiṁ samaye attamanatā hoti somanassaṁ:
sn55.6:13.4: Yadā pana mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ suṇāma:
sn55.6:13.5: ‘sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme’ti, hoti anappakā no tasmiṁ samaye attamanatā hoti anappakaṁ somanassaṁ:
sn55.6:14.1: “Tasmātiha, thapatayo, sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
sn55.6:14.3: “Atthi kho no, bhante, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti.
sn55.6:14.4: “Katamo pana vo, thapatayo, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti?
sn55.6:15.1: “Idha mayaṁ, bhante, yadā rājā pasenadi kosalo uyyānabhūmiṁ niyyātukāmo hoti, ye te rañño pasenadissa kosalassa nāgā opavayhā te kappetvā, yā tā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa pajāpatiyo piyā manāpā tā ekaṁ purato ekaṁ pacchato nisīdāpema.
sn55.6:15.2: Tāsaṁ kho pana, bhante, bhaginīnaṁ evarūpo gandho hoti, seyyathāpi nāma gandhakaraṇḍakassa tāvadeva vivariyamānassa, yathā taṁ rājakaññānaṁ gandhena vibhūsitānaṁ.
sn55.6:15.3: Tāsaṁ kho pana, bhante, bhaginīnaṁ evarūpo kāyasamphasso hoti, seyyathāpi nāma tūlapicuno vā kappāsapicuno vā, yathā taṁ rājakaññānaṁ sukhedhitānaṁ.
sn55.6:15.4: Tasmiṁ kho pana, bhante, samaye nāgopi rakkhitabbo hoti, tāpi bhaginiyo rakkhitabbā honti, attāpi rakkhitabbo hoti.
sn55.6:15.5: Na kho pana mayaṁ, bhante, abhijānāma tāsu bhaginīsu pāpakaṁ cittaṁ uppādetā.
sn55.6:15.6: Ayaṁ kho no, bhante, etamhā sambādhā añño sambādho sambādhataro ceva sambādhasaṅkhātataro cā”ti.
sn55.6:16.1: “Tasmātiha, thapatayo, sambādho gharāvāso rajāpatho, abbhokāso pabbajjā.
sn55.6:16.3: Catūhi kho, thapatayo, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.6:17.2: Idha, thapatayo, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.6:17.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.6:17.6: vigatamalamaccherena cetasā ajjhāgāraṁ vasati muttacāgo payatapāṇi vossaggarato yācayogo dānasaṁvibhāgarato.
sn55.6:17.7: Imehi kho, thapatayo, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.6:18.1: Tumhe kho, thapatayo, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgatā—
sn55.6:18.2: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.6:18.5: yaṁ kho pana kiñci kule deyyadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ appaṭivibhattaṁ sīlavantehi kalyāṇadhammehi.
sn55.6:18.7: katividhā te kosalesu manussā ye tumhākaṁ samasamā, yadidaṁ—
